reporting-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States

title.narrative: LMI Services for NDF. LMI Support contract for ISN/NDF. Miscellaneous/Other Contractual Services - Other Contractual Services NOC (A, B, C) (ITA) (INS) (FAS)

description.narrative: Combat transnational terrorism, especially from al-Qa'ida, its affiliates, and adherents using a strategic counterterrorism approach that focuses on 1) countering violent extremism; 2) building the capacity of civilian law enforcement and criminal justice institutions to address threats within their own borders; and 3) building stronger relationships with our partners around the world – in order to engage in a broader, more comprehensive counterterrorism effort that treats civilian institutions, to include the justice sector and law enforcement, as a critical part of building effective partner capacity to counter terrorism.

This award strives to combat transnational terrorism, counter violent extremism, build the capacity of civilian law enforcement and criminal justice institutuions, and build stronger relationships with our partners around the world. This includes NON-PROLIFERATION[Covers miscellaneous contractual services not otherwise classified under Miscellaneous/Other Contractual Services.]. NON-PROLIFERATION[Covers miscellaneous contractual services such as A&E contracts and IT site preparation by the PBA, GSA, and commercial contracts, among other things.]. Information has been redacted in accordance with the two principled exceptions defined in the Foreign Aid Transparency and Accountability Act (FATAA) of 2016: the health and security of implementing partners, and the national interest of the United States.. Information Redacted~[Covers miscellaneous contractual services such as A&E contracts and IT site preparation by the PBA, GSA, and commercial contracts, among other things.]. OTHER SERVICES[Covers miscellaneous contractual services not otherwise classified under Miscellaneous/Other Contractual Services.].
